title: garage456
author: garage456
content: Hello Am looking for a self hosted betting script preferrably opensource  As long as it has the functions to save me time am fine, feeds if integrated or needs to be bought no problem, I do have my own feeds Please do not recommend basic ones like prophecy or betlab they only allow single bet with no betslip or any useful functions If you have a script to show, please note that a demo will be needed, including backend demo access and frontend to try before buyScreenshots are not enough, and links to demo sites that some scammers use to sites they do not own are useless  again, if you propose your own script or platform be willing to offer backend/frontend user demo access to try. Thank you

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Check this thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5409276.0 can't recommend if this is really legit but it's the recent thread that comes up with what you're looking for. You can contact the OP and talk to each other with what you're looking for. Thank me later if this is really what you've needed.

comments.author: UpAgain
comments.body: If you start a casino buying a script is dangerous ca be many holes on this people can hack your site and steal all bitcoins.there are casinos like  softwiss that take care of the security and open for you a casino. for commissions. You don't need to own scripts. owning this shit is a trouble especially if you are not a programmer and can review code and secure it.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: UpAgain on September 23, 2022, 10:16:55 PMIf you start a casino buying a script is dangerous ca be many holes on this people can hack your site and steal all bitcoins.^ This is very true, I would prefer to hire a legitimate developer than buy a ready-made Sportsbetting script. There are many scenarios here where those who bought gambling script becomes suspected of copy-pasting into other gambling casinos become their reputation were ruined. Think about the future when your gambling casino becomes popular, there are too many possible troubles that you probably encounter if you will force yourself to buy gambling casino script.

comments.author: garage456
comments.body: QuoteCheck this thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5409276.First regarding this it looks like the leaked goldsvet casino script ( the laravel script with nulled games ) And this I already have and being maintained over this discord : https://discordme.at/ifnull      As for the Sportsbook, am trying to save time and money ofcourse, this project is to run fantasy betting like app not real betshere is the problem, sportsbook providers  (who i actually deal with and have a real live betting website with ) take GGR commission, and no provider accepted to sell for a flat rate copy so i can run the fantasy - betting like clone, which i was willing to pay  Not super scared of bugs as I can maintain it and have devs do too, but it saves a lot of time for now If not found, it is the way to go for sure . Something else would have been in my favor, that I can provide the feeds if the script (logically) will not come with those odds feeds etc.For example, first test I took a look at betlab, used a zapier to connect my feeds to database populated data, cool But then noticed the whole functions are very basic, so no math in betslip, no combinations nothing just a single Bet - Anyway, no harm in asking, especially if I can find something i can launch before WC2022 as a fantasy betting (real betting style) instead
